docs.text: the people who populate the movie 54 are shallow , self-absorbed and self-indulgent .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: in other words , they perfectly mirror the era as well as the movie this feature depicts .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: 54 is the story of that well-publicized new york disco , studio 54 , the in-place in the '70s where anybody who was anybody went to be ogled , photographed and pampered .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the difficulty with 54 , which was written and directed by mark christopher , is that his script takes no point of view .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: christopher neither condemns nor glorifies the legendary excesses that were studio 54's hallmark .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: he keeps an uninvolved distance , thus keeping us from forming any emotional attachment with any of the protagonists .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the movie's one main asset is the surprising performance by mike myers as steve rubell , the famous owner of the nightspot .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: he is part rebel , part dreamer , part shrewd entrepreneur .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: he's smart enough and childlike enough to pander to the dreams and desires of his clientele , yet stupid enough to brag on tv about hiding profits from the irs .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: myers , in his first straight character part , is in turn appealing and appalling .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: at one moment he can try to pressure a male employee into a sexual situation , then at the next moment apologize for his bad behavior and offer the young man a handful of cash .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the story is told by shane o'shea ( ryan phillippe ) , a new jersey lad who dreams of crossing the river to the big apple .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: shades of john travolta's brooklyn-bound tony in saturday night fever .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: eventually , shane does come to new york , attracts rubell's eye and is admitted to the promised land .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: his looks get him a job as a busboy , and he is later promoted to the prestigious position of bartender , where he mixes with and makes drinks for the rich and famous .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: shane's dream is to meet soap star julie black ( neve campbell ) , a fellow garden stater .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: but both characters are so sketchily drawn that even when they do hook up , it's no big deal .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the chemistry between shane and julie is nonexistent .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: 54 is a very cold , uninvolving movie .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it's all strobe lights and glitz , all substance .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it's sort of like the musical era it covers .
docs.label: negative
